projects.title: Built Accounting
projects.description: Built is a financial technology company with the vision of democratizing prosperity for small businesses in Africa. The enterprise deploys web and mobile technologies that help small businesses start, run and grow their businesses. The companyâ€™s flagship product is a financial record keeping application that enables small business owners easily keep and manage their financial data for quick data-driven decision making, and also to access a curation of financial services that suit their size and needs.  Working together with the team at Built Accounting, we've been able to successfully developed and deployed both the Android and a iOS applications that is used being by over 7,000 businesses across Africa.

projects.title: Alvi Beauty Services Ltd.
projects.description: A beauty service booking platform that allows users to book beauty services from the comfort of their homes. The system features four mobile app (two for iOS and two for Android) and a web dashboard for service providers as well as a super admin dashboard for the company. There''s a web version for users to book services as well.  The system is currently in development and will be released to the public soon. However a public testing build is available for download.

projects.title: The Red Butterfly
projects.description: This is an eCommerce website for a company called The Red Butterfly. They manufacture and sell skincare products ranging from soaps, lotions, creams, and oils that improve the quality of your skin by removing dark spots and smoothening skin and tone. The website includes an eCommerce and online payment integration.

projects.title: Geofrelin Ltd.
projects.description: A ccompany profile for Geofrelin Ltd. The website features an eCommerce functionality where users are able to request quotes from the company.

projects.title: Alvi Beauty Services Ltd.

The system features four mobile app (two for iOS and two for Android) and a web dashboard for service providers as well as a super admin dashboard for the company. There''s a web version for users to book services as well. The system is currently in development and will be released to the public soon. However a public testing build is available for download.

projects.title: GetAll Ghana Ltd.
projects.description: An on demand service App that connects users to service providers in Ghana. The app is currently in development and will be released to the public soon. However a public testing build is available for download. The system features two mobile app (two each for iOS and Android) and a web dashboard for service providers as well as a super admin dashboard for the company.

projects.title: Ejuma Africa Ltd.
projects.description: The Ejuma App is a better way for SMEs to manage their debtors, staff and access loans from hiring staff, taking attendance, recording sales, accepting payments and accessing loans.

projects.title: Inspect.MapThis.Site
projects.description: A cloud-based app that allows users to inspect to inspect transmission towers, wind turbines, solar panels, and other structures using drones. The app allows annotating such images the drones have taken of these structures and also generation of comprehensive reports on the data gathered. The app was made with React for the frontend and NodeJS for the backend.

projects.title: Tipme
projects.description: This is one of the complex apps I have worked on so far. I built the backend using NodeJs and the Super Admin panel with Next.Js and the mobile app with a combination of native development using Java and React Native for the interface. The apps is one that allows street musicians to get discovered by nearby audience who has the app installed and allows these audiences to tip/donate to them via the app. It depends very much on iBeacon to achieve the discovery of performers and their approximate locations. The app also allows users to create events/performances that are broadcasted via iBeacon so they are discovered by nearby Givers.
